definition.value: Stripe Payment
Additional settings are required to complete Stripe payment setup. See additional settings tab.
Payment
Success: You have modified Stripe payment settings!
Location:
All Locations

Max credit cards saved:
Set maximum number of credit cards to be saved by customers (up to 100). If set to 0 or blank saving of cards will not be allowed. Security note: Customer credit card details are saved on stripe secure servers to ensure maximum data security measures. No credit card details will be saved on your site.
You need to connect with stripe to set up payment details
Stripe settings
Connect with Stripe
Disconnect Stripe
Cannot connect?
Connected to Stripe successfully
Disconnected from Stripe successfully

Test mode:
Set to ON if you want to use test key

Live Secret Key:
Locate this in Stripe Dashboard -> Developers -> API Keys Section. Key starts with sk_live_...

Live Publishable Key:
Locate this in Stripe Dashboard -> Developers -> API Keys Section. Key starts with pk_live_...

Test Secret Key:
Locate this in Stripe Dashboard -> Developers -> API Keys Section. Key starts with sk_test_...

Test Publishable Key:
Locate this in Stripe Dashboard -> Developers -> API Keys Section. Key starts with pk_test_...

Settlement type:
If set to 'auto', then the transaction will be included in today's settlement. If set to 'delayed', then the transaction will be authorised but not settled(captured). You must manually capture transactions within 7 days of authorisation
Published Key:

Success & settled:
Select main order status you want to set in response to payment processor status

Success & not settled:
Select main order status you want to set in response to payment processor status

Decline:
Order status you want to record in history in response to payment processor status. Main order status is not affected. Order will not be placed only after payment is a success.
Auto (authorize and capture)
Delayed (authorize only)
Internal error. Check error log or input parameters!
Stripe test key is required
Stripe live key is required
Warning: You do not have permission to modify Stripe Payment!
